text: Mixed marriage may refer to: * Intermarriage ** Consanguinity in marriage ** Cultural assimilation ** Exogamy * Interracial marriage * Interethnic marriage * Interreligious marriage, also called interfaith marriage * Lavender marriage * Marital conversion, religious conversion based on marriage * Miscegenation * Mixed-orientation marriage, marriage involving spouses who do not have the same sexual orientation * Mixed Marriage (play), a 1911 play by St John Greer Ervine * Transnational marriage
title: Mixed marriage
